docs.lead_paragraph: Two psychiatrists and a professor respond to an Op-Ed essay criticizing current treatment of schizophrenia.
docs.snippet: Two psychiatrists and a professor respond to an Op-Ed essay criticizing current treatment of schizophrenia.

docs.abstract: The problem is now where Obama ended up but how he got there.
docs.snippet: The problem is now where Obama ended up but how he got there.

docs.lead_paragraph: The national birthrate is now about half what it was during the late 1950s, as Hispanic women, who have generally had the highest fertility rates in the country, are choosing to have fewer children.

headline.seo: Hispanic Pregnancies Fall in U.S. as Women Choose Smaller Families
headline.main: Hispanic Pregnancies Fall in U.S. as Women Choose Smaller Families
headline.print_headline: U.S. Birthrate Dips as Hispanic Pregnancies Fall

docs.abstract: Hispanic women in the United States, who have generally had country's highest fertility rates, are choosing to have fewer children, causing American birthrate to hit record low; national birthrate is now about half what it was during the baby boom years, when it peaked in 1957 at 122.7 births per 1,000 women of childbearing age.
docs.snippet: The national birthrate is now about half what it was during the late 1950s, as Hispanic women, who have generally had the highest fertility rates in the country, are choosing to have fewer children.

docs.lead_paragraph: The Obama administration said Monday that employers must offer health insurance to employees and their children, but will not be subject to any penalties if family coverage is unaffordable to workers.

headline.seo: Employers Must Offer Family Health Care, Affordable or Not, Administration Says
headline.main: Employers Must Offer Family Care, Affordable or Not
headline.print_headline: Employers Must Offer Family Care, Affordable or Not

docs.abstract: Obama administration, in long-awaited interpretation of new health care law, says employers must offer health insurance to employees and their children, but will not be subject to any penalties if family coverage is unaffordable to workers.
docs.snippet: The Obama administration said Monday that employers must offer health insurance to employees and their children, but will not be subject to any penalties if family coverage is unaffordable to workers.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
